short: Dystopia; surveillance; propaganda; control; rebellion; truth; freedom.
full: George Orwell's novel depicts a dystopian society under total state control, where truth is manipulated and individual freedom is crushed.

title: The Hobbit
short: Adventure; friendship; courage; journey; fantastical creatures.
full: Bilbo Baggins, a comfort-loving hobbit, sets out on a quest with dwarves to reclaim the treasure guarded by Smaug.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
full: In the 1930s American South, young Scout Finch watches her father, Atticus, defend an innocent Black man, confronting prejudice and learning empathy.

title: The Catcher in the Rye
full: Holden Caulfield recounts a few turbulent days in New York, searching for meaning and authenticity.

title: Pride and Prejudice
short: Love; social class; prejudice; family; humor.
full: Elizabeth Bennet and Mr. Darcy overcome pride and prejudice within a rigid society.

title: Brave New World
short: Dystopia; conformity; hedonism; technology; liberty vs. stability.
full: Huxley imagines a standardized world where happiness is manufactured and individuality is suspect.

title: Fahrenheit 451
short: Dystopia; censorship; books; mass media; moral awakening.
full: Montag, a fireman who burns books, begins to doubt the system and seeks meaning through reading.

title: The Lord of the Rings
short: Epic fantasy; friendship; sacrifice; good vs. evil; journey.
full: An unlikely fellowship seeks to destroy the One Ring to save Middle-earth.

title: A Game of Thrones
short: Fantasy; politics; family; war; moral ambiguity.
full: The noble houses of Westeros vie for the Iron Throne as ancient threats return from the north.

title: The Book Thief
short: War; Nazi Germany; the power of words; loss; humanity.
full: Death narrates the life of Liesel, a girl who steals books and finds hope amid the horrors of war.

title: The Name of the Wind
full: Kvothe recounts his life, from orphaned child to prodigious student at a university of magic.

title: All Quiet on the Western Front
full: A young German soldier endures the absurdity of the trenches in World War I.
